events.title: Relocation to South Africa
events.description: A young mind adapting to a new environment and culture.

events.title: Early Graduation
events.description: I enjoyed a successful high school career, securing a first-place ranking every year and maintaining a 99% average in most years, alongside the privilege of serving as head prefect.

events.title: From Student to Teacher
events.description: Returned to high school as a teacher at age 17, taking on the unique challenge of instructing former peers.

events.title: University Enrollment
events.description: Commenced dual-focus studies in Computer Science and Applied Statistics.

events.title: Graduation with Distinction
events.description: Awarded a B.Sc. in Applied Statistics and B.Sc. Honours in Computer Science. Gained deep expertise in data science, statistical analysis, and software engineering.

events.title: FinTech Innovation
events.description: Spent 3.5 years at Electrum Payments building distributed systems for digital goods and transactions used by South Africa's top banks and retailers.

events.title: Future Horizons
events.description: Exploring emerging technologies that have the potential to shape the future.
